summary: Just a retexture of female draugr armor with some enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
I do seriously apologize to everyone who first downloaded this mod but couldn't get the textures to load. My skyrim crashed and I had to reload it and downloaded this file and it happened to me. So what I have done, is redo everything basically.Â  The textures are the same, but the file will need to be manually downloaded. I should also mention that this is a standalone mod.
Just place the esp file in skyrim/data folder.
The texture file will need to go into skyrim/data/textures/armor folder.

This is a retexture of female draugr heavy armor with some ridiculous enchantments on it. I made this for myself and I play with requiem and I am always getting spanked, so I figured this would be a nice addition for myself. The armor is in a chest on the island in Riverwood near the tree stump where Faendal sits. This is FEMALE ONLY. It should work with all races, but I can't guarantee the beast races.

UPDATE

I have packaged the esp and the textures into a single file for download. Just download them and activate them through the add file option on nmm. The armor was very shiny before, so I have taken care of that.

I would love to hear peoples comments, so please drop me a line.
author: flyingmushroom00
